SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model

Class SimplifiedModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.view_model.SimplifiedModel
public class SimplifiedModel extends Object
This class represents a simplified version of the model. It provides methods to access the attributes and put together the simplified version.
